title: Raja Raja Cozhandhaan Lyrics Sahadevan Mahadevan
stanzas:
Raja Raja Sozhandhaan
pottu vacha road idhu
Cholan potta roadula
pallavan bus odudhu

mannar aatchi ingae
maarithaan pochu
mandhiringa aatchi
vandhu naalum aachu

kalaignar silayai
yaaru ingae odachadhu
kurangu kayyil
poomaalai kedachadhu

naanum neeyum
naatta thirutha
paattu padippomaa
naayi vazha
nimutha nammaal
mudiyumaa
